article.headline: SMS 85, Drake 78
article.story: SPRINGFIELD, Mo. (AP) -- Blake Ahearn came off the bench to score 21 points to lead Southwest Missouri to its seventh straight win, beating Drake University 85-78 Saturday. Drake (8-1, 4-10 in Missouri Valley Conference), which trailed by as many as 14 in the first half, got to within one with 3:51 left in the game but didn't score a field goal the rest of the way. The Bulldogs opened the second half with a 17-7 run to cut Southwest Missouri's 48-36 halftime lead to 55-53 with 13:57 left. The Bears (14-8, 8-6) held Drake to two baskets and a free throw over the next 5:10 while scoring 13 to take a 68-58 lead with 8:18 remaining. Drake used its full-court press to go on a 14-5 run and trail 73-72 with 3:51 on a 3-ponter by Nick Grant as the shot clock expired. Tamarr Maclin, who played less than two minutes in the first half because of foul trouble, made a field goal and two free throws to give Southwest Missouri a 77-72 lead with 2:20 left. The two teams traded free throws the rest of the way. Southwest Missouri was 55.6 percent from the field (25 of 45) while Drake made just 38.7 percent (24 of 62). Deke Thompson had 15 points for Southwest Missouri. Kellen Easley scored 13 and Maclin finished with 11. Chris Bryant led Drake with 18. Pete Eggers had 12. Grant, Lonnie Randolph and David Brancroft added 10 each.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
